# List All Default App Clip Experiences for an App Clip

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get all default App Clip experiences for an App Clip.

## Getting App Clip Experiences

- **List All Advanced App Clip Experiences for an App Clip**: Get all advanced App Clip experiences for an App Clip.
- **GET /v1/appClips/{id}/relationships/appClipAdvancedExperiences**
- **GET /v1/appClips/{id}/relationships/appClipDefaultExperiences**

items.description: Get all advanced App Clip experiences for an App Clip.
